titleStmt.title: Unto His Grace, Earl of Marchmont, lord high commissioner of Scotland and the right honourable Estates of Parliament the petition of Henry Payne, humbly sheweth, that where your petitioner a stranger, being apprehended eight years ago and upwards ...
titleStmt.author: Payne, Henry Neville, fl. 1672-1710.
England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the John Carter Brown Library.
